name: Ghost in Headlights
description:
This is a game made for a class game jam about climbing up a tower as a ghost, avoiding being seen by the ghost hunters as you climb

You can only move in the darkness, but you can only see the level in the light, can you remember the layout and dodge the hunters to make it to the end?

This game was made by Douglas, Gabriel , Mason, and Jackson

Music credits to Lena Raine and Queen
